quotes.quote: Weddings are fun. It's like, 'Hey, we're giving up. Let's celebrate.'
I will not kill Joey Tribbiani. He is my friend.
You could play a child soldier in World War III. It's coming soon, brought to you by Pepsi.
I'm going to go do drugs in the bathroom. And by drugs, I mean mushrooms. And by bathroom, I mean your desk.
Welcome to the 2020s. Nothing matters, and we're all going to die.
I sent them all to detention, but they kept coming of age!
I fixed my weird mental hang-up. Yay, me!
You're not my family. You're my work family. Which means I tolerate you because you make me money.
Oh my God. I was hired for my face.
I don't want to be an evil overlord. Unless it's the only way to make the world more organized.
Bullshit, listen up kids, everything they teach you in school is a lie. Want the truth? The world is controlled by a shadow elite of shape-shifting lizard people.
Welcome to media manipulation and subliminal messaging, where we invent bullshit to keep people distracted.
Sorry i'm late, a father should never miss his daughter's first sentencing.
People are really are their best selves when they don't have to try.
Nostalgia is bullshit. It is a brain-worm that makes adults regress into children...
Most conspiracies are just capitalism.
... sometimes, the hard thing is the right thing.
No moon? No tide. Half the globe will be flooded. What will wolves howl at?
You know, lording your ethical superiority over people, it's not very ethical. Ethics aren't ethical ?
There are special people like us who should run the world, and there's normies like Orinn, who deliver our pizza and fight our wars.
Life is just dreams turn into entropy.
Why does Banksy create art on boring walls? The challenge.
I'm the smartest person in the room, and that's usually because I'm the only one in the room.
I don't want to be a villain. I want to be a hero. But the world is a complicated place, and sometimes, heroes have to do bad things to make the world a better place.
The world is a cruel place, and the only way to survive is to be crueler.
The only thing that matters is power. And I have all the power.
The world is a lie. And I'm the one who's going to tell it.
I'm not here to make friends. I'm here to make money.
I'm just a simple guy, trying to make my way in the world.
I'm not a hero. I'm just a guy who's good at his job.
The world is a stage, and we're all just players in the game.
The truth is out there, but it's not always what you're told.
The world is a dangerous place, but it's also a beautiful place. It's up to us to decide which one we want to see.
... for a better tomorrow. We are Cognito Inc. We've got covered, up !
I'm not perfect, but I'm trying my best.
I'm not a bad guy. I'm just trying to make the world a better place... in my own way.
I'm not a coward. I'm just afraid of heights... and spiders... and clowns... and the dark... and... okay, I'm kind of a coward.
I'm not always right, but I'm never wrong.
I'm not a scientist. I'm just a guy with a lot of money and a lab coat.
I'm not a hippie. I'm just a guy who likes to smoke mushrooms and talk about peace and love.
I'm not sure what I want to do with my life, but I'm having a lot of fun along the way.
I'm not the villain. You are.
I'm not a hero. I'm just a guy who's good at being in the right place at the right time.
I'm not a puppet. I'm a string puller.

characters.name: Reagan Ridley
characters.occupation: Chief of Operations at Cognito Inc.
characters.personality: Reagan is a brilliant but socially awkward engineer who works at Cognito Inc. She is ambitious and cynical, but she also has a kind heart.

characters.name: Rand Ridley
characters.occupation: Founder and former CEO of Cognito Inc.
characters.personality: Rand is a paranoid and delusional man who believes that the world is controlled by a shadow government. He is also manipulative and power-hungry.

characters.name: Brett Hand
characters.occupation: Assistant to the Chief of Operations at Cognito Inc.
characters.personality: Brett is a kind and loyal friend, but he can also be awkward and insecure. He is often caught in the middle of the conflict between Reagan and her father.

characters.name: Gigi Thompson
characters.personality: Gigi is a cynical and sarcastic woman who is often seen drinking wine and complaining about her job.

characters.name: J.R. Scheimpough
characters.occupation: Chief financial officer at Cognito Inc.
characters.personality: J.R. is a greedy and self-absorbed man who is obsessed with money. He is also manipulative and ruthless.

characters.name: Robotus
characters.occupation: A robot who works at Cognito Inc.
characters.personality: Robotus is a loyal and obedient robot who is programmed to follow orders. He is also quite literal and has a hard time understanding human emotions.

characters.name: Glenn Dolphman
characters.occupation: Head of security at Cognito Inc.
characters.personality: Glenn is a dim-witted and easily distracted man who is often seen eating candy. He is also quite clumsy and accident-prone.

characters.name: Dr. Andre Lee
characters.personality: Dr. Andre is an eccentric scientist who is often seen experimenting on strange things. He is also quite brilliant, but he can also be quite reckless.

characters.name: Magic Myc
characters.personality: Magic Myc is a hippie who is often seen smoking drugs and talking about peace and love. He is also quite spiritual and believes in the power of crystals.

characters.name: Tamiko Ridley
characters.personality: Tamiko is Reagan's mother and Rand's ex-wife. She is a sarcastic and critical woman who often mocks her ex-husband.

organizations.name: The Illuminati
organizations.description: A secret society that controls the world. They are the most powerful organization in the world, and they control everything from the government to the media.

organizations.name: The Shadow Council
organizations.description: A mysterious and ancient cabal of masked figures. They occasionally recruit new members from other secret organizations. Their overall agenda is unknown, but they are in favor of bull markets. In a cold war with Atlantis, allies of the Lizard People, owners of Cognito Inc.

organizations.name: Cognito Inc.
organizations.description: Seems to be the operations arm of the Shadow Council. They report to the council and carry out their will, but their executives are given a fairly high degree of autonomy, allowing them to determine how to carry out the council's wishes and allowing them to pursue their own agenda to some extent. Also referred to as 'The Deep State'.

organizations.name: The Lizard People
organizations.description: A species of shape-shifting reptoids that have infiltrated the highest levels of human society. Allied with Cognito Inc., but it's unknown if they're aware of the existence of the Shadow Council. Their alliance is based on a promise to maintain global warming in exchange for funding.

organizations.name: The US Government
organizations.description: Heavily compromised by various secret societies, but no one society controls the whole thing. Cognito Inc. controls the executive branch only.

organizations.name: The British Government
organizations.description: Likely compromised as well, given the connections between the royals and secret societies, and MI6's willingness to work with Cognito Inc.

organizations.name: Atlantis
organizations.description: Seems to be in a state of cold war with the rest of the underworld. Neither Cognito Inc nor the Lizard People seem fond of them. For unknown reasons, NASA is willing to edit them out of photos of Earth.

locations.name: Cognito Inc. Headquarters
locations.description: The main office of Cognito Inc., located in Washington D.C. It's a high-tech facility with various secret departments and advanced technology.
locations.significance: Main setting of the series, where most of the characters work

locations.name: Shadow Council Chamber
locations.description: A mysterious, dimly lit room where the Shadow Council meets to make decisions that shape the world.
locations.significance: Where major world-altering decisions are made

locations.name: Reagan's Apartment
locations.description: Reagan Ridley's living space, often seen in the series.
locations.significance: Provides insight into Reagan's personal life and mindset

locations.name: Reptoid Gala Venue
locations.description: An opulent location where the annual Reptoid Gala is held.
locations.significance: Key location for lizard people conspiracy storylines

locations.name: 1980s Trapped Town
locations.description: A small town deliberately kept in a perpetual 1980s state by Cognito Inc.
locations.significance: Showcases Cognito Inc.'s power to manipulate reality on a large scale

locations.name: Hollow Earth
locations.description: A vast underground world beneath the Earth's surface.
locations.significance: Confirms the Hollow Earth theory and hosts various hidden societies

locations.name: Moon Base
locations.description: A secret base located on the dark side of the Moon.
locations.significance: Strategic location for monitoring Earth and potential alien encounters

locations.name: Atlantis
locations.description: The legendary sunken city, revealed to actually exist in the series.
locations.significance: Major player in global conspiracies, often at odds with surface world powers

locations.name: MKULTRA Memorial Laboratory
locations.description: A laboratory for memory and mind control research, paying homage to a secret government project.
locations.significance: Key location for experiments on mind control.

locations.name: Blissful Mind Spa
locations.description: A spa designed for Cognito Inc. members, offering mind control therapies for the staff.
locations.significance: Demonstrates methods of stress management and psychological manipulation.

locations.name: Area 51 Annex
locations.description: A secret facility run by Cognito Inc., distinct from the famous military base.
locations.significance: Reinforces theories of government collaborations with extraterrestrials.

conspiracies.name: Deep State
conspiracies.description: Cognito Inc. operates as the true power behind the US government, controlling major decisions and events.

conspiracies.name: Flat Earth
conspiracies.description: The belief that the Earth is flat, secretly promoted by certain factions within the shadow government.

conspiracies.name: Moon Landing Hoax
conspiracies.description: The idea that the Apollo moon landings were faked, a conspiracy actually managed by Cognito Inc.

conspiracies.name: Reptilian Infiltration
conspiracies.description: Shape-shifting reptilian beings have infiltrated the highest levels of human society.

conspiracies.name: Illuminati Control
conspiracies.description: A secret society that controls the world, including governments and media.

conspiracies.name: Atlantis Existence
conspiracies.description: The lost city of Atlantis actually exists and is in a cold war with the rest of the underworld.

conspiracies.name: Controlled Global Warming
conspiracies.description: Global warming is deliberately maintained by Cognito Inc. in exchange for funding from the Reptilians.

conspiracies.name: Media Manipulation
conspiracies.description: Cognito Inc. actively controls and manipulates media to shape public opinion.

conspiracies.name: Memory Suppression Technology
conspiracies.description: Cognito Inc. possesses and uses devices capable of erasing specific memories from individuals.

conspiracies.name: Project Reboot
conspiracies.description: A massive initiative by Rand Ridley to alter reality and people's memories on a global scale.

conspiracies.name: Public Figure Cloning
conspiracies.description: Certain public figures are replaced with clones controlled by Cognito Inc.

conspiracies.name: 80s Trapped Town
conspiracies.description: A small town is deliberately kept in a perpetual 1980s state.

conspiracies.name: Vatican Manipulation
conspiracies.description: Cognito Inc. actively influences the decisions and actions of the Pope and the Catholic Church.

conspiracies.name: Celebrity Control
conspiracies.description: Some Hollywood celebrities are actually supernatural creatures (like vampires) or are controlled by Cognito Inc.

conspiracies.name: Holographic Disguise Technology
conspiracies.description: Cognito Inc. possesses advanced technology that can project a completely different appearance over a person or object.

technologies.name: Memory Wipe Device
technologies.description: A device used by Cognito Inc. to erase specific memories from individuals.
technologies.creator: Cognito Inc. R&D Department

technologies.name: Hologram Disguise System
technologies.description: Advanced technology that can project a completely different appearance over a person or object.
technologies.creator: Dr. Andre Lee

technologies.name: Robot President
technologies.description: An advanced android capable of replacing the actual President of the United States.
technologies.creator: Reagan Ridley

technologies.name: Time Manipulation Device
technologies.description: A device capable of altering the flow of time in a specific area.
technologies.creator: Cognito Inc. R&D Department
notable_uses: Keeping a town perpetually in the 1980s

technologies.name: Mind Control Chips
technologies.description: Miniature devices that can be implanted to control an individual's thoughts and actions.
technologies.creator: Cognito Inc. R&D Department

technologies.name: Weather Control Machine
technologies.description: A device capable of manipulating weather patterns on a global scale.
technologies.creator: Cognito Inc. in collaboration with Reptilians

technologies.name: Cloning Technology
technologies.description: Advanced technology capable of creating perfect genetic copies of individuals.
technologies.creator: Cognito Inc. R&D Department

technologies.name: Project Reboot
technologies.description: A massive system capable of altering reality and people's memories on a global scale.
technologies.creator: Rand Ridley

technologies.name: Truth Seeking Goggles
technologies.description: Glasses that allow the wearer to see the hidden truth behind appearances.
technologies.creator: Cognito Inc.

technologies.name: Invisibility Cloak
technologies.description: A cloak that renders the wearer invisible.
technologies.creator: Cognito Inc.

technologies.name: Memory Implant Device
technologies.description: A device capable of implanting false memories.
technologies.creator: Cognito Inc. R&D Department

episodes.name: Unpresidented
episodes.synopsis: As Reagan prepares to replace the president with a robot, she finds her hard-earned promotion threatened by a clueless but likable new colleague.

episodes.name: Clone Gunman
episodes.synopsis: When an expensive blunder forces budget cuts at Cognito Inc., J.R. orders Reagan and Brett to decide which of their co-workers should be fired.

episodes.name: Blue Bloods
episodes.synopsis: After a lizard people-related PR disaster, the team must do damage control at the swanky Reptoid Gala, where — to Reagan's dismay — hugs are required.

episodes.name: Sex Machina
episodes.synopsis: After Cognito Inc. buys a dating app, Reagan bets her team she can find a boyfriend — and creates a robot version of her perfect match to practice on.

episodes.name: The Brettfast Club
episodes.synopsis: Brett hopes to have a blast in the past as the team embarks on a nostalgia-laced mission to a small town that's permanently stuck in the '80s.

episodes.name: My Big Flat Earth Wedding
episodes.synopsis: Reagan conspires to keep her dad from finding out about her mom's wedding, while J.R. ropes Brett into a personal mission to help offload his mega-yacht.

episodes.name: Ghost Protocol
episodes.synopsis: Reagan sets an elaborate plan in motion to ghost a debonair British secret agent who grows too attached after a fling.

episodes.name: Buzzkill
episodes.synopsis: Desperate to get some space from her father, Reagan volunteers for a dangerous mission to the moon to make contact with a rogue colony.

episodes.name: Mole Hunt
episodes.synopsis: Exciting changes are afoot at Cognito Inc., but first, Reagan and her team must find the mole behind a security breach that could take down the company.

episodes.name: Inside Reagan
episodes.synopsis: To find a forgotten password and save Cognito Inc., Reagan goes deep into her mind and accesses memories from her dysfunctional childhood.

episodes.name: How Reagan Got Her Grove Back
episodes.synopsis: With Rand back in control of Cognito Inc., Reagan gets revenge — and has a hookup — at a Burning Man-style gathering of secret societies.

episodes.name: Whoas-Feratu
episodes.synopsis: Tamiko's new beau is a Hollywood A-lister with a taste for blood, but that doesn't stop a jealous Rand from trying to break up the cozy couple.

episodes.name: Reagan & Mychelle's Hive School Reunion
episodes.synopsis: The Cognito crew plays along with Magic Myc's big lies at a class reunion until he goes too far. Meanwhile, Rand finds a gross 'gift' on his desk.

episodes.name: We Found Love in a Popeless Place
episodes.synopsis: Reagan has to turn the new, woke pope into a fire-and-brimstone pontiff, so she's off to Italy with a friend — and a little romance on the side.

episodes.name: The Brettwork
episodes.synopsis: Brett's an overnight sensation when he sits in as the host of a right-wing TV show, but quickly becomes a political puppet gleefully controlled by Rand.

episodes.name: Rontagion
episodes.synopsis: Now that she's sleeping with the Illuminati, Reagan decides it's time for the Cognito Inc. gang to meet Ron and persuade him to jump ship.

episodes.name: Project Reboot
episodes.synopsis: Rand unleashes Project Reboot as the Cognito co-workers learn about their alternate lives — and how a tin foil hat can actually come in handy.

episodes.name: Appleton
episodes.synopsis: With Cognito under new leadership, Reagan meets with the Robes who want a partnership, but she needs to make a big decision about her future.
